text:
hey devs, we now have the ability to sort HubDB data by column in BETA.

Users can click on column headers of sortable column types, and row data will sort ascending, or descending. Column sorts do not persist between table loads, or for different users, and do not propagate to live website data - this UI sort is only intended to help manage and edit data more easily.

If anyone wants to give it a try, please let me know!
